title: Fabulous NYC Hotel in Soho
text: 60 Thompson is a charming boutique hotel located in Soho. The location is ideal for all the shopping and restaurants in Soho. The rooms are clean, spacious (for NYC), and well decorated. The bathrooms are beautiful and bathrobes are provided.There is also a very cool bar and restaurant in this hotel. The hotel staff is very friendly and helpful.I would absolutely recommend this hotel - its one of my NYC faves!
